# title

**Instance Property**

The localized title of the media query section.

## Declaration

```swift
var title: String { get }
```

## Working with media query sections

- **range**: The range in the media query’s items or collections array that the media query section represents.

items.description: The range in the media query’s items or collections array that the media query section represents.
items.name: range

title: title
